TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Bashar_al-Assad, title = Bashar_al-Assad, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bashar_al-Assad} }

S.FORM: Bashar al Assad I 1965 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 11 a romi'ad masofoc ci Bashar al Assad, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Syria anini i ci Bashar al Assad, patirengan a romi'ad i 2000 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 17 a romi'ad. kasofocan a loma' lalamod salikaka natayalan pitooran
